name: Drive, Funky, Drive!
description:
Game Description

Drive, Funky, Drive! is a challenging arcade video game of 12 levels. 
When Funky drives his car, he wants to finish the race to be free again, while destroying the enemies and avoid obstacles.
It will make you fun, boost your adrenaline, and make you smile 😄

Controllers MENU NAVIGATION
  • Menu Navigation : Left click on the mouse
KEYBOARD
  • Slow Down : Left Arrow (or A)
  • Speed Up : Right Arrow (or D)
  • Jump : Up Arrow (or W)
  • Shoot : Space Bar
Thanks!

Drive, Funky, Drive! was created for your enjoyment.
I wish you fun and excited playing. 
Cheers 😉
